Package org.greencheek.processio.service.scheduler

Contains the implementation of ProcessIOScheduler that stores uses a single threads scheduled executor service that periodically reads the current process's io from a given ProcessIOReader and persists that result IO, if it is valid, using the given implementation of the ProcessIOUsagePersistence interface

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ProcessIOScheduler Interface that abstracts the way by which the scheduling of the continuous acquistion of process io information is obtained.
 

Class Summary
ScheduledExecutorServiceProcessIOScheduler Uses a single threaded executor service the contains a runnable task that simply: calls ProcessIOReader.getCurrentProcessIO() asks for the resulting CurrentProcessIO to be persisted by the implementation of ProcessIOUsagePersistence The CurrentProcessIO is only requested to be persisted if is not the ProcessIOReader.NON_READABLE_PROCESS_IO instance User: dominictootell Date: 22/04/2012 Time: 18:38
 

Package org.greencheek.processio.service.scheduler Description

Contains the implementation of ProcessIOScheduler that stores uses a single threads scheduled executor service that periodically reads the current process's io from a given ProcessIOReader and persists that result IO, if it is valid, using the given implementation of the ProcessIOUsagePersistence interface
